_thread
=======

.. py:module:: _thread

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Multithreading support.

   MicroPython module: https://docs.micropython.org/en/v1.23.0/library/_thread.html

   CPython module: :mod:`python:_thread` https://docs.python.org/3/library/_thread.html .

   This module implements multithreading support.

   This module is highly experimental and its API is not yet fully settled
   and not yet described in this documentation.



Classes
-------

.. autoapisummary::

   _thread.LockType


Functions
---------

.. autoapisummary::

   _thread.allocate_lock
   _thread.exit
   _thread.get_ident
   _thread.stack_size
   _thread.start_new_thread

----------------

   .. py:method:: acquire(*args, **kwargs) -> _typeshed.Incomplete


   .. py:method:: locked(*args, **kwargs) -> _typeshed.Incomplete


   .. py:method:: release(*args, **kwargs) -> _typeshed.Incomplete
